data.clusterId: ___Replace with the resource ID of the AKS Cluster___
data.namespace: ___Replace with the AKS namespace that you are deploying to___

name: ___Replace with the desired Service Conneciton Name___
url: ___Replace with the URL of the AKS Cluster___

serviceEndpointProjectReferences.name: ___Replace with the desired Service Conneciton Name___

projectReference.id: ___Replace with the project ID from the Azure DevOps___
projectReference.name: ___Replace with the project name from the Azure DevOps___
